span.span: The mission of the Boonville R-I School District is to provide all students with the opportunity to receive a quality education, become responsible individuals, competent workers and contributing citizens.​

div.span: Persons with accessibility issues can be provided website access and information in a modality appropriate to the individual. Please contact the District's Technology Director, Kevin Carpenter, at kcarpenter@bpsk12.net ​or call 660-882-7426 ext. 7612 for additional information.
